item.title: Back2Basics P.1 - e and log
item.description: The e You probably have heard the saying that “there is no force in the universe more powerful than compound interest”. It was supposedly said by Albert Einstein. The saying could be an urban legend but it points out the importance of the concept called exponential growth. Einstein could have said “there is no force in the universe more powerful than exponential growth” and he would have made the same point but I think there is this slight difference between them which is “possibility”.
